name: Wings of Magloryx
description: As Magloryx the dragon, you will use flight, spells, and combat to destroy castles, rescue peasants, collect gold, and reclaim your five stolen relics. Each of the five worlds offers a distinct setting and a new challenge. Collected gold can be used to purchase spells and upgrades that will assist you throughout the game, especially during challenging boss fights. Can you help Magloryx reclaim his treasures and return home? Can you restore peace to the HoverRealms?
